cms.query.QueryText: select p.CampaignsProductID,s.SKUName,s.SKUProductCustomerReferenceNumber as POSNumber,p.QtyPerPack, s.SKUValidUntil,b.BrandName as BrandName,s.SKUDescription from KDA_CampaignsProduct p join View_CMS_Tree_joined t on p.CampaignsProductID=t.DocumentForeignKeyValue join COM_SKU s on s.SKUID=t.NodeSKUID join KDA_Brand b on b.ItemID=p.BrandID where ##WHERE##
